input.prompt: Summarize the key points about supporting external local deps/outputs

result_preview:
Based on the discussion, here are the key points about supporting external local dependencies/outputs:

1. At the time of this forum discussion (mid-2018), DVC did not fully support external local dependencies/outputs.

2. Ruslan (a DVC developer) acknowledged this limitation, noting: "We have added initial support for s3/gs/hdfs dependencies/outputs... but I didn't really get to supporting [local deps/outs] case just yet."

3. He created a GitHub issue (https://github.com/iterative/dvc/issues/7...
